biotools.summary: Social LEAP Estimates Animal Pose (SLEAP) is a framework for multi-animal body part position estimation via deep learning. It is the successor to LEAP. SLEAP is written entirely in Python, supports multi-animal pose estimation, animal instance tracking, and comes with a labeling/training GUI that supports active learning.

bioschemas.name: SLEAP
